casebody.data:
BRADLEY & CURRIER CO., Appellant, v. LALLY, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

May 8, 1893.) Action by the Bradley & Currier Company against James J. Lally.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, J.T.

G. F. Alexander, for appellant. Theo. H. Friend, for respondent.

No opinion. Leave to appeal to the court of appeals denied, with $10 costs. See 21 N. Y. Supp. 1044.
